channel.title: bash on smk's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in bash on smk's Blogs

item.title: shells
item.description: Debian Check the file/etc/shells if it doesn’t contain following line then add the line /bin/bash FreeBSD sudo pkg install bash chsh -s /usr/local/bin/bash Installing bash using pkg automatically updates /etc/shells Installing Some Utilities dnsutils # dig, nslookup joe # text editor lynx # text-mode web browser pbzip2 # paralled bzip2 pigz # parallel gzip rlwrap # enables backspace for some CLI commands Installing from a packages list #!/bin/bash -e cd /root/setupfiles/ apt-get install `cat *-dpkg.
